description: Returns events related to DAX clusters and parameter groups. You can obtain events specific to a particular DAX cluster or parameter group by providing the name as a parameter. By default, only the events occurring within the last 24 hours are returned; however, you can retrieve up to 14 days' worth of events if necessary.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to include in the response. If more results exist than the specified MaxResults value, a token is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. The value for MaxResults must be between 20 and 100.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Provides an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: An array of events. Each element in the array represents one event.

nested_items.name: SourceName
nested_items.description: The source of the event. For example, if the event occurred at the node level, the source would be the node ID.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: Specifies the origin of this event - a cluster, a parameter group, a node ID, etc.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A user-defined message associated with the event.

nested_items.name: Date
nested_items.description: The date and time when the event occurred.
